Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This arises from the result of a decrease in the contents of high electron affinity DTBT units as the number of perylene units in the polymers increased.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| contents of high electron affinity DTBT units |
| number of perylene units in the polymers |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| contents of high electron affinity DTBT units |
| number of perylene units |

Note: DTBT stands for 2,3-dithiobenzothiophene, a type of organic semiconductor material. High electron affinity refers to the ability of a material to easily gain an electron. Therefore, the "contents of high electron affinity DTBT units" can be considered a material property.
